content: this crochet hammer pattern is a fun hammer designed to fit a rattle inside the hammerhead so it makes lots of noise for a little boy or girl we made this pattern in two different versions so one pattern fits a newbeginner level this means it s detailed and have a lot of photos the other pattern fits an experienced crocheter it s short and gives a good overview over the pattern if you need ekstra photos you can always take a look in the newbeginner pattern materials needed cotton yarn 8/4 - black and gray less than 50 grams of each color stuffing crochet hook 3 mm us size d yarn needle 2 pipe cleaners for stability in the shaft rattle/musicbox preferable 30 mm or smaller we would love to see the finished result please mention us on instagram @kreaklub and/or use the hashtags #kreaklub #crochethammer we can also be found on facebook @kreaklubdk © 2018 kreaklub all rights reserved the pattern is for personal use only you may not sell or otherwise disclose it instead refer to our instagram or facebook where you can contact us you can sell the finished product with reference to kreaklub as the designer of the pattern
